Katie's Creative Web
Development Portal

Github

Github is a Git repository hosting service that includes all of my projects from Creative Web.

Bash Me

Bash Me is a one page html document that only uses the terminal to make changes.

Commitment

Commitment uses css animation, css patterns, css shapes, and creative google fonts and icons to make at least 100 git commits and pushes to github.

Parallax
Narrative

Parallax Narrative is an informational narrative about water conservation using the mechanic of css parallax scrolling.

Analytics
Usage Report

Analytics Usage Report captures the traffic to my parallax narrative project. It reveals useful and interesting information about the demographic characteristics.

Custom
Boilerplate

Custom Boilerplate is a custom starting template that combines html5 boilerplate with a webpack dart-sass setup.

Exquisite
Corpse

Exquisite Corpse is a creative narrative in the form of a fake news article where each team member contributes a paragraph based on what the previous person contributed.

Creative
Project

Scramble is a multi-player word game that utilizes various Node.js libraries, such as Express.js, SOCKET.IO, and EJS.
